name: Orbital Pendant
description: A gravity-defying suspended light featuring a brushed brass ring and a hand-blown opal glass sphere. Its minimalist design makes it a perfect focal point for modern dining spaces or entryways, providing a warm and diffuse glow.

name: Mono Desk Lamp
description: Minimalist task lighting constructed from a single piece of bent matte black aluminum. Features a touch-sensitive base with three-step dimming control, offering focused, glare-free light perfect for any workspace or bedside table.

name: Eclipse Sconce
description: A wall-mounted ambient light that mimics a solar eclipse. The backlit LED design casts a soft, indirect halo effect, creating a serene and atmospheric glow. Ideal for hallways, living rooms, or as a piece of sculptural wall art.

name: Void Floor Stand
description: An architectural floor lamp with a slender, monolithic profile. The integrated LED strip is recessed within the carbon fiber frame, providing a powerful yet glare-free column of indirect light to illuminate any corner.

name: Aether Chandelier
description: A statement chandelier composed of twelve hand-blown glass shards suspended from a central matte black canopy. Each shard catches and refracts light differently, creating a dynamic, sparkling effect ideal for grand foyers or above large dining tables.

name: Forma Table Lamp
description: A brutalist-inspired table lamp carved from a solid block of grey concrete. The exposed Edison bulb provides a raw, industrial aesthetic, while the concrete base remains cool to the touch. A perfect accent for shelves or sideboards.

name: Beam Wall Light
description: The ultimate in minimalism. A single, solid beam of anodized aluminum that can be mounted horizontally or vertically. It casts a wide, even wash of light, perfect for illuminating artwork or as a modern vanity light.

name: Carry Lamp
description: A portable, rechargeable LED lamp designed to go wherever you do. With a durable aluminum handle and a dimmable, frosted glass dome, it provides up to 8 hours of continuous, warm light, perfect for evenings on the patio or as a movable night light.

name: Axis Track System
description: A modular track lighting system for the ultimate in flexibility. The kit includes a 2-meter track and three adjustable spotlights that can be positioned anywhere along the rail. Perfect for kitchens, galleries, and retail spaces.
